chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Paet al'Caar, p. 109 [9]—Shepherd from near Emond's Field. He is in town to help with shearing. Years later, he was among those that supported Hari Coplin in his accusations that Moiraine brought the Trollocs to Emond's Field on Winternight. His son, Wil, had his leg broken in that attack and was Healed by Moiraine, so Paet was less fervent in his accusations. See also al'Caar, Wil.
